publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8089 Bill Butler: Scottish Premier League Trust—That the Parliament commends the work of the Scottish Premier League (SPL) Trust, a standalone charity responsible for promoting sport, physical activity and positive lifestyle messages to as wide an audience as possible; welcomes the publication of the SPL Community Report 2011; congratulates the trust and SPL clubs on the invaluable community work that it considers that they undertake across Scottish society; understands that every week SPL clubs dedicate 6,600 hours to enable 23,600 individuals to take part in club projects such as the Futures Jobs Fund Programme and Football Fans in Training, and supports the trust’s statement that "Football has the power to bring communities together and change people’s lives for the better".
S3M-8089 Scottish Premier League Trust (lodged on 7 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
